snippet.title: Archaelund Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore a vast open world and crawl through dungeons in first person, then fight tactical turn-based battles from a top-down perspective. Guide your adventuring party through Archaelund, mankind's last frontier, and uncover its many secrets.

Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1082970

Programming, writing, game design: David Ballestrino
Environment artist: Alberto Trujillo
2D art and concepts: Nacho Corva
Creatures artist: Bob Metcalfe (Secretanorak)
Music: Laura Ballestrino
Additional 3D art: Francisco José Retamero
Additional coding and game design: Alejandro Ballestrino

Archaelund is still in development;  an Early Access version will be out in fall 2022, allowing players to participate through their feedback.
